umbrellaSection.title: Do you know what the umbrella means for guides?
umbrellaSection.subtitle: A symbol of tradition, unity, and care for the visitor.
umbrellaSection.text1: In Foz do Iguaçu, the umbrella has become an icon. It is not just an item to protect against rain or strong sun.
umbrellaSection.text2: For guides, the colorful umbrella is a reference point, a sign that your guide is there, ready to lead and take care of you. It is a symbol of welcome and a link of connection amidst the crowd.
umbrellaSection.text3: It represents the union of our class and the care with which we receive each visitor, ensuring that no one gets lost and that everyone enjoys the experience to the fullest. A hug in the form of an umbrella!
